# Scientist SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#cc65fc]Scientist[/color] of this station.
For the purposes of Alert Escalation: Treat higher alerts as if they are still on the previous alert level. (Yellow Alert is Blue Alert if it was Blue Alert prior.) Furthermore, treat Delta, Gamma, Epsilon, and Violet Alert as Red Alert.
## Green Alert 65. Scientists are not permitted to bring grenades, harmful chemicals, nor Toxin bombs outside of the Science Department. [bullet/]Exceptions for the Toxin bombs if being handed over to the Cargo Department for Salvaging operations.
65. Scientists should give a warning over the Commons Channel and Science Channel before generating an anomaly.
65. Scientists are not permitted to create AI Console Boards nor AI Control Boards without permission from Research Director and/or Captain.
## Blue Alert 65. Scientists are not permitted to bring harmful chemicals outside of the Science Department.
65. Scientists should give a warning over the Commons Channel and Science Channel before generating an anomaly.
65. Scientists are permitted to bring grenades outside of the Science Department, but must justify their uses.
65. Scientists are permitted to bring Toxin bombs outside of the Science Department, but only to deliver to Armory and/or Cargo Department for Salvage operations.
## Red Alert 65. All Guidelines from [color=#65c65]Green Alert[/color] and [color=#65b65a65]Blue Alert[/color] carry over. No special guidelines in [color=#ba65c]Red Alert[/color].
